title: Projects
text:
Conducted time-series analysis on evaporation data from 1956 onward.
Used Python & Excel to identify long-term trends in Texas and surrounding states.
Worked with Texas Water Development Board to improve water allocation models.
View Project on GitHub





Developed interactive plots in RStudio using ggplot2.
Analyzed climate impacts on river flow rates.
Created a Quarto report for public outreach.





Assisted in civil engineering projects focusing on river reclamation.
Studied urban water management techniques.


Want to see my work? Check out my GitHub Portfolio.
